app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/2079-4991/9/10/1375/s1, Figure S1: ( a), ( b), ( c) The luminescence decay profile of V 5+, V 4+ and V 3+ ions for different Ga 3+, respectively; Figure S2: Emission spectra of V-doped nanocrystals recorded in the range of −150 °C–300 °C.
